meta.article_title: February 10, 2020 - Stepping Around the Backhand Corner

debutant.nom: Forehand out of the backhand corner
debutant.description: Set up shot, assess whether to step around or not, footwork itself, shot itself, and return to ready position.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Forehand out of the backhand corner drill
exercices_complementaires.description: Practice stepping around the backhand corner with different shots and opponents.

metriques_progression.nom: Step around the backhand corner challenge
metriques_progression.description: Challenge yourself to step around your opponent's backhand corner with a forehand shot.

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Don't commit to a forehand shot too early
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Wait for your opponent to commit before stepping around the backhand corner.
